text:
e="preserve">Delphine Gibson (August 17, 1903 – May 9, 2018) was an American supercentenarian. She was born Fairfield County, South Carolina. At the age of was the oldest person in the United States. She became the oldest living American upon the death of Adele Dunlap on February 5, 2017.
She married Tyler Gibson in 1928. They had three children. Gibson lives in Huntingdon, Pennsylvania. Gibson died on May 9, 2018 at the age of 114.
